name: Team04-PanicPlanetKeeper
description:
Descriptions :

Kiro lives alone on a planet. This little creature has anxiety attacks many times. His only way to relieve stress is to take a bath but it has a great impact on the global environment. However, taking a bath has a bad impact on the environment. Can you balance your inner good with the good of the earth? Stabilize the balance with this management and survival game.

This game was made in three days during the Gamejam related to the Princess Mission organised by WALGA, BitSummit and many more. The team was composed of Japanese and Belgian people.

Controls :

QD for AZERTY and AD for QWERTY to move. 

E or Space to interact.

Here is a link to the Main Theme composed by Mélinda during the jam (hope you enjoy the music ! ):

Thank's for playing our game. Leave us a comment, we will be grateful of that ! And if you have gameplay video of the game, share with us ! We're looking forward to hear your return !
